$comment: Schema version 2.3 - Added display configuration for real-time output verbosity. Uses $ref composition.
title: Blueprint Workflow Schema
description: JSON Schema for hiivmind-blueprint workflow.yaml files

description.description: Brief description of the workflow's purpose

definitions.description: External type definitions source (optional - defaults to embedded definitions)

entry_preconditions.description: Conditions that must be true before workflow can start

initial_state.description: Initial state values when workflow begins. Note: Some fields are computed at runtime and not declared here - see $comment for details.
initial_state.$comment: Runtime fields (computed at initialization, not declared): interface (string: 'claude_code' or 'claude_ai' based on AskUserQuestion tool availability), workflow_name, workflow_version, current_node, previous_node, history, user_responses, checkpoints, awaiting_input

prompts.description: User prompt execution mode configuration (interactive or tabular)

display.description: Skill-specific display configuration for real-time output (priority 2 in 4-tier hierarchy)

imports.description: External YAML files to load at workflow start

start_node.description: ID of the first node to execute

nodes.description: Map of node IDs to node definitions

endings.description: Map of ending IDs to ending definitions

recovery.description: Recovery guidance for error endings. Can be a simple string or structured object.

definitions.description: External type definitions source configuration. Allows workflows to reference type definitions from URLs or local paths.
definitions.$comment: Schema version 1.0 - External type definitions support (GitHub Actions-style references)

source.description: Type definitions source. Can be a URL to bundle.yaml, 'local' for embedded definitions, or a shorthand like 'hiivmind/hiivmind-blueprint-lib@v1'

path.description: Local path to embedded definitions (required when source is 'local')

consequences.description: Path to consequences index.yaml relative to base_url

preconditions.description: Path to preconditions index.yaml relative to base_url

extensions.description: Additional type definition packages to load
